entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain except freezing rain over northern sections early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
